item.title: Petkin Pet Wipes for Dogs and Cats (Large Size) – Removes Daily Dirt & Odor from Your Pet’s Ears, Eyes, Face, Butt, and Body – Convenient for Home or Travel – Various Pack Quantities Available

From the brand

Shop Petkin Dental Products

Shop Petkin Sunscreen Products

Shop Petkin Specialty Products

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.5 x 7 x 4.8 inches; 4.08 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 3, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Petkin
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08LMMSQ83
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

Gentle For Your Furry Friend – These refreshing dog wipes are extra gentle and ideal for daily use around your pet’s eyes, ears, face, body and butt. Won’t remove spot flea treatments. Perfect for your puppy, kitten and even pet pig! Lightly scented, vanilla and coconut.
Use Less Wipes – The 7 x 11 inch wipes are larger than standard wipes, making them the smart choice for large pets and helps reduce how many wipes you need to use. Moistened with a gentle cleaning formula, and enriched with a soothing organic oat extract to keep your pet’s coat soft, shiny and smelling great.
Super Convenient, Goodbye Shampoo – Petkins are perfect for quick touch ups between baths. Use as dog paw wipes after a muddy walk, or when it’s too cold for a bath outside. A great solution for older pets that are difficult to bathe.
Easy To Use – Open the lid and remove seal. Pull a wet dog wipe out. Close lid tightly. Gently wipe entire pet until clean. No water or rinsing is required. Use daily or as needed.





Read more



Original Wipes Germ Wipes Oatmeal Wipes Paw Wipes Plaque Wipes Plaque Gel
Why Use? Wipes that help freshen up your pet every day. Easily remove daily dirt and odor with a quick wipe down Heavy duty pet wipes that remove daily dirt and odor, like washing hands. Cleans your pet without shampoo Gentle pet wipes enriched with oatmeal. Easily remove daily dirt, alongside soothing dry, itchy skin The quick and convenient way to remove dirt, sand and mud from your pet’s paws after outdoor fun Dental wipes that remove daily residue to keep your pet’s teeth and gums clean and healthy Easy to use dental gel that cleans teeth, gums, plaque and tartar while freshening your pet’s breath
For Dogs & Cats ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
No Parabens or Sulfates ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Veterinarian Tested ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

From the brand

Seat Covers to Fit Any Need

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.24 x 8.27 x 4.33 inches; 2.82 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ A275
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 23, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Active Pets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07G642RMQ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

UNIVERSAL FIT – We made these car seat covers for dogs of all shapes and sizes! From tiny smart cars to SUVs, our car seat protector is sure to fit like a glove.
EASY TO CLEAN – Dreading the shedding? No worries – even if your furry friend gets hair everywhere, our back seat cover for dogs is made with 600D Oxford waterproof cotton for easy vacuuming and cleaning.
PET PROTECTION – Safety first! 4 heavy-duty headrest anchors and 2 seat anchors keep this dog back seat cover completely in place, so your pet doesn’t slip and slide around (even on the bumpiest rides).
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION – Have any questions, comments, or concerns about your dog car seat cover? Our customer satisfaction team is purr-fectly happy to give you a helping hand (or paw)!

Non-slip Rubber Backing

Keeps your bestie safe and secure in the backseat with no slipping or sliding — even on the bumpiest rides.

4 Adjustable Buckle Straps

Adjust straps to fit around your headrests as needed and attach them to secure the cover.

Hook-and-loop Openings

Allows seat belt buckles to fit through the cover for passengers to ride with your pet.

2 Seat Anchors

Tuck into the crevices of your car seats to keep the cover securely in place.

Read more

Caterpillar ToughRide Heavy-Duty 4 Piece Rubber Floor Mats For Car Truck Van SUV, Black – Premium Trim to Fit Car Floor Mats, All Weather Deep Dish Automotive Floor Mats, Total Dirt Protection.
Shape and Size is Engineered to Fit Most Cars, Trucks, Vans and SUVs. Made to be trimmable to fit your vehicle’s floor contours with only a pair of Scissors. No more having to strain your back from stuffing your mats just to get them to fit. Simply cut through the lines until you find the perfect fitment. Measurements: Front: 26″ x 20″ inch Rear: 20″ x 19″ inch
Trimmable to Fit Certain Trims of the following Vehicles – F-150; Silverado; Ram; RAV4; CRV; Accord; Prius; Wrangler; Pilot; Sentra; Traverse; Tucson; Escape; Outback; CX-5; Forester; Cherokee; Explorer; Equinox; Sierra; Tacoma; Highlander; Civic; Corolla; Camry; Rogue
Maximum Weather Protection – Protect your vehicle’s flooring by catching spills, stains, dirt and debris that other floor mats can miss. These mats are durable and long lasting and will withstand normal wear and tear.
Waterproof – The uniquely constructed linear and diagonal ridges are placed strategically within the deep dish of these mats to maximize its trapping capabilities. Water, snow, mud and debris are contained and will not escape or leak through into the vehicle’s interior.
No-Slip Grip – Rubberized nibs on the bottom so the mat always stays in place – Ergonomic grooves on top to give your foot more traction & comfort.

Read more

item.title: Niubya Dog Pooper Scooper, Extra Large Poop Scooper for Large and Small Dogs with Long Handle, Metal Pet Poop Tray and Rake Set for Dirt, Gravel, Lawns, Grass
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Cleaning up poop is an inevitable part of dog ownership. Whether in your own yard or on a walk, you know that if you own a dog, you’ll be stooping and scooping at regular intervals. If you’re not keen on the idea of using a plastic bag and your hand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $19.19
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:53:17 UTC – Details)


Cleaning up poop is an inevitable part of dog ownership. Whether in your own yard or on a walk, you know that if you own a dog, you’ll be stooping and scooping at regular intervals. If you’re not keen on the idea of using a plastic bag and your hand to pick up after your pet, a dog pooper scooper can be an excellent tool to use.

Niubya Poop Scoop provides a convenient and comfortable way to clean up after dogs. The dog poop scooper is equipped with an adjustable handle that extends up to 38 inches in length for a comfortable height for pet parents. The tray, spade, and extra large pan are made of a durable, heavy-duty antirust metal that stays stronger for longer. The metal material of the pet pooper scooper is easy to wipe down or hose off for simple cleaning. The handles have built-in hook holes for easy and convenient storage.

Package Include
metal tray x 2
metal rake x 2
metal spade x 2
pc link x 2
stainless steel tubes x 9
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 16.38 x 9.57 x 3.35 inches; 3.68 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Nby-TR3-XL
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 1, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Niubya
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08D6P38Y1

Adjustable Ergonomic Handle: Each handle consists of three sections, the maximum length can reach 38 inches, and with the innovative clip-on structure design. Makes it convenient for people of all heights to use, as you won’t need to bend down to use it.
Lightweight and Durable Construction: The handle is made of premium stainless steel, a plastic sleeve is installed on the top. The rake, tray, and dustpan are treated with antirust coating. So there’s no need to worry about using your new scoop in wet or stormy weather.
Easy to clean and Store: Comes with a non-stick surface that makes cleaning a breeze. Treated with non-stick coating. This poop scooper set is very easy to clean, just hose off when the chores are done. The handle can be easily detached to make storage easy and also save space.
Worry-free with 100% Satisfaction: We want you to be 100% satisfied with the product. If you have any questions regarding your order, please feel free to get in touch with our friendly Customer Service Team.

4.5
Price: $39.99 - $19.19
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:53:17 UTC – Details)
